long_description: The Toysmith Crystal Mining kit makes a brilliant gift for the budding geologist on your list. They are sure to love its natural crystals, tools and fact guide. Plaster block contains 8 natural crystals to be excavated with the included digging tool. The Toysmith Crystal Mining kit also contains a brush, magnifier, display case, pouch and detailed instructions.
short_description: The Toysmith Crystal Mining kit makes a brilliant gift for the budding geologist on your list. They are sure to love its natural crystals, tools and fact guide.
